item.title: References: Statement of Purpose
item.description:
1. V Sundar, S Siddique, K Mitra, “Unified Image Recovery for Lensless Systems”, to be submitted in the IEEE Transactions on Computational Imaging 2020.

  2. The 9th HULT Prize, Singapore. Held at Nanyang Technology University (NTU), Singapore,16th to 18th March 2018.

  3. V Sundar, A Sadhu, R Nevatia, “FARCNN: Decoupling attributes from object detection”, Viterbi-IUSSTF (Indo US Science and Technology Forum) REU Symposium, July 2019.

  4. Yicheng Wu, Vivek Boominathan, Huaijin Chen, Aswin C. Sankaranarayanan, and Ashok Veeraraghavan. Phasecam3d — Learning phase masks for passive single view depth estimation. In IEEE Intl. Conf. Computational Photography (ICCP), 2019.

  5. Achuta Kadambi, Vage Taamazyan, Boxin Shi, and Ramesh Raskar. Polarized 3d: High-quality depth sensing with polarization cues. In International Conference on Computer Vision (ICCV), 2015.

  6. Blog Post on extending LSD SLAM.

  7. Centre for Innovation, IIT Madras.
